Structs/TvChannel.html#/code.name: code
Structs/TvChannel.html#/code.abstract: The Snapscreen-specific channel code for this TV channel

Structs/TvChannel.html#/grabbed.name: grabbed
Structs/TvChannel.html#/grabbed.abstract: Whether this tv channel is grabbed by Snapscreen and available for snapping

Structs/TvChannel.html#/logoURL.name: logoURL
Structs/TvChannel.html#/logoURL.abstract: An optional link to a channel logo

Structs/TvChannel.html#/posterURL.name: posterURL
Structs/TvChannel.html#/posterURL.abstract: An optional link to a channel poster image

Structs/TvChannel.html#/liveImageURL.name: liveImageURL
Structs/TvChannel.html#/liveImageURL.abstract: Optional URL for a live image of the currently epg unit on this channel

Structs/TvChannel.html#/liveImageURLSecu.name: liveImageURLSecured
Structs/TvChannel.html#/liveImageURLSecu.abstract: Determines whether an access token is necessary when fetching the liveImageURL

Structs/SportEvent.html#/startTime.name: startTime
Structs/SportEvent.html#/startTime.abstract: The queued start date of the event

Structs/SportEvent.html#/endTime.name: endTime
Structs/SportEvent.html#/endTime.abstract: The queued end date of the event

Structs/SportEvent.html#/dataProviderCod.name: dataProviderCode
Structs/SportEvent.html#/dataProviderCod.abstract: Provider code for the sport data - e.q. Betradar

Structs/SportEvent.html#/dataProviderMat.name: dataProviderMatchId
Structs/SportEvent.html#/dataProviderMat.abstract: Id for this event for the given sportDataProvider - e.g. Betradar MatchID

Structs/SportEvent.html#/competitors.name: competitors
Structs/SportEvent.html#/competitors.abstract: Information about the competitors in this event

Structs/SportEvent.html#/tvChannel.name: tvChannel
Structs/SportEvent.html#/tvChannel.abstract: Tv channel this event is presented on

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/competitor.name: competitorId
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/competitor.abstract: An optional competitorId - refers to an entry of competitors of a SnapOddsResult

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/sportsBook.name: sportsBook
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/sportsBook.abstract: Optional name of the sports book this offer is from. Only set for bestOffers

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/bestOutcom.name: bestOutcome
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/bestOutcom.abstract: Optional boolean if this outcome is the best available outcome of the given type

Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/redirectUR.name: redirectURL
Structs/SnapOddsOutcome.html#/redirectUR.abstract: The optional direct (web) redirect URL to this outcome

Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html#/redirect.name: redirectURL
Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html#/redirect.abstract: The direct (web) redirect URL to the bets for this provider

Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html#/teamId.name: teamId
Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html#/teamId.abstract: The id of the team of this player - refers to the id of a SnapOddsCompetitor

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/competitors.name: competitors
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/competitors.abstract: Information about the competitors in this event

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/players.name: players
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/players.abstract: Information about the players in this event

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/sportsBooks.name: sportsBooks
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/sportsBooks.abstract: A list of providers that offer bets

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/bestOffers.name: bestOffers
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html#/bestOffers.abstract: The best offers available. Each offer might be by a different odds provider (sports book)

Structs/SnapOddsResult.html.name: SnapOddsResult
Structs/SnapOddsResult.html.abstract: Represents the odds for a sport event

Structs/SnapOddsCompetitor.html.name: SnapOddsCompetitor
Structs/SnapOddsCompetitor.html.abstract: Represent a competitor for a sport event

Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html.name: SnapOddsPlayer
Structs/SnapOddsPlayer.html.abstract: Represent a player for a sport event

Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html.name: SnapOddsSportBook
Structs/SnapOddsSportBook.html.abstract: Represents the offers of an odds provider

Structs/SportEventCompetitor.html.name: SportEventCompetitor
Structs/SportEventCompetitor.html.abstract: Represents a competitor in a sport event

Protocols/SnapscreenSnapDelegate.html#/s.name: snapscreenSnapViewController(_:didSnapSportEvent:)
Protocols/SnapscreenSnapDelegate.html#/s.abstract: Called when the snap view controller snaps a sport event. Snapping will automatically stop since we assume that you will navigate to a new screen. If you want to continue snapping, call continueSnapping on the SnapViewController.

Protocols/SnapscreenLiveEventsStatusChan.name: snapscreenLiveEventsStatusDidChange(isLive:)
Protocols/SnapscreenLiveEventsStatusChan.abstract: Called after initialisation and when the live status of an upcoming sportsEvent changes

Protocols/SnapscreenLiveEventsStatusChan.name: SnapscreenLiveEventsStatusChangeDelegate
Protocols/SnapscreenLiveEventsStatusChan.abstract: Delegate providing information about the live event status

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/forSpor.name: forSportsMedia(configuration:)
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/forSpor.abstract: Creates and returns a new SnapViewController for Sports Media Mode. So after snapping, the OddsResultsViewController for the snapped sport event is presented.

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/forSpor.name: forSportsOperator(configuration:snapDelegate:)
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/forSpor.abstract: Creates and returns a new SnapViewController for Sports Operator Mode. So after snapping, the provided SnapscreenSnapDelegate is informed about the snapped sport event and you choose how to proceed.

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/snapVie.name: snapViewDidAppear()
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/snapVie.abstract: Call if you manually want to notify the ViewController about appearance (e.g. if you previously presented another view above the SnapViewController and it is now reappearing)

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/snapVie.name: snapViewWillDisappear()
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/snapVie.abstract: Call if you manually want to notify the ViewController about disappearance (e.g. if you partially present another view above the SnapViewController)

Classes/SnapViewController.html#/continu.name: continueSnapping()
Classes/SnapViewController.html#/continu.abstract: Continue snapping when snapping was stopped due to sport event result being delivered to SnapscreenSnapDelegate in Sports Operator Mode.

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/SnapscreenAuthe.name: SnapscreenAuthenticationChangedNotification
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/SnapscreenAuthe.abstract: Notification that is sent out when the authentication changes - afterwards it is advised to fetch the updated value of authorizationHeader in case it is used

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/country.name: country
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/country.abstract: The country code the user is in. Affects the results that are found when snapping. Defaults to AT.

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/usState.name: usState
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/usState.abstract: The US state the user is in. Possibly affects the odds results provided. Defaults to nil.

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/colorConfigurat.name: colorConfiguration
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/colorConfigurat.abstract: Color configuration - preconfigured with default Snapscreen values - modify as desired. See documentation for reference in UI designs

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/fontConfigurati.name: fontConfiguration
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/fontConfigurati.abstract: Font configuration - preconfigured with default Snapscreen values - modify as desired. See documentation for reference in UI designs

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/snapUIConfigura.name: snapUIConfiguration
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/snapUIConfigura.abstract: UI Configuration - preconfigured with default Snapscreen values - modify as desired

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/oddsUIConfigura.name: oddsUIConfiguration
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/oddsUIConfigura.abstract: Game Odds Display UI configuration - preconfigured with default Snapscreen valeus - modify as desired

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/liveEventsStatu.name: liveEventsStatusChangeDelegate
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/liveEventsStatu.abstract: Delegate providing information about the live event status

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/setup(withClien.name: setup(withClientId:clientSecret:environment:)
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/setup(withClien.abstract: Initialize Snapscreen with your clientID and clientSecret and one of the predefined environments

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/setup(withClien.name: setup(withClientId:clientSecret:backendURL:)
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/setup(withClien.abstract: Initialize Snapscreen with your clientID and clientSecret and a custom backend URL

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/getOddsForSport.name: getOddsForSportEvent(withId:completion:)
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/getOddsForSport.abstract: Fetches the odds for a sport event with the provided id. If no results are found (either because sport event does not exist or no odds are found, the completion closure is called with a nil result

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/authorizationHe.name: authorizationHeader
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/authorizationHe.abstract: The current authorization header used by Snapscreen. Set as header ‘Authorization’ in case you access any secured Snapscreen backend endpoints

Classes/Snapscreen.html#/currentTimestam.name: currentTimestamp
Classes/Snapscreen.html#/currentTimestam.abstract: The current timestamp as synced by Snapscreen - useful for synchronizing exact timestamps determined during snapping

Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html#/init(.name: init(point1:point2:point3:point4:)
Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html#/init(.abstract: Constructor for a quadrangle - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.name: init(fingerprintData:preprocessedImageData:preprocessedImageWidth:preprocessedImageHeight:preprocessedImageChannels:quadrangle:timestamp:)
Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.abstract: Constructor for a fingerprinting result - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: timestamp
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: The unix timestamp (milliseconds since 1.1.1970) that represents the recognized frame

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: snapscreenTimestampDelta
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: A relative delta to the current snapscreen timestamp - use this for very exact syncing with the backend by adding to Snapscreen.instance.currentTimestamp

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: sportEvent
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: The event this result is associated to - only set if event is found

Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.name: tvChannel
Classes/SportEventSnapResultEntry.html#/.abstract: The channel this result is associated to - only set if no event was found as fallback

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapTitle
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Snap Title - set to nil if you want to customize this on your own

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapHintText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Snap Hint/Instruction shown in the snap ui

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: showHelpButtonText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Show Help Button Text - shown as the right side bar button item in the navigation bar when the snapping UI is visible

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapProgressText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Progress text while manual snap is being handled

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapErrorGeneralText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Error text when any error occured during snapping

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapErrorConnectionIssueText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Error text when any connection error occured during snapping

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapErrorTechnicalIssueText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Error text when a technical issues error occured during snapping

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: snapErrorNoResultsText
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Error text when no result was found for manual snap

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: hidePoweredBySnapOddsBranding
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Hides the powered by SnapOdds branding in the Odds Display UI

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: dismissButtonText
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Text for the dismiss button shown as rightBarButtonItem in the navigationBar. If nil, a systemItem .done is used

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: hidePoweredBySnapOddsBranding
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Hides the powered by SnapOdds branding in the Odds Display UI

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/autosnap.name: autosnapIntervalInSeconds
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/autosnap.abstract: The minimum interval between automatic snap attempts in seconds; Defaults to 0.5

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/autosnap.name: autosnapTimeoutDuration
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/autosnap.abstract: The time interval after which automatic snapping stops when no results are found; Defaults to 30 seconds

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/quadrang.name: quadrangleDetection
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html#/quadrang.abstract: Perform quadrangle detection to improve snap result quality and accuracy. Defaults to true

Classes/SnapConfiguration.html.name: SnapConfiguration
Classes/SnapConfiguration.html.abstract: Configuration to be passed when snapping. Allows you to specify behaviour of the snapping process

Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.name: SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfiguration
Classes/SnapscreenOddDisplayUIConfigurat.abstract: Configuration for the Odds Display UI. See See https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/snapodds-sport-media/customization for customization options

Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.name: SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration
Classes/SnapscreenSnapUIConfiguration.ht.abstract: Configuration for the customizing the Snap UI. See https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/snapodds-operator/customization or https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/snapodds-sport-media/customization for customization options

Classes/SnapscreenUIColorConfiguration.h.name: SnapscreenUIColorConfiguration
Classes/SnapscreenUIColorConfiguration.h.abstract: Configuration for colors in Snapscreen provided UI. See https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/snapodds-operator/customization or https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/snapodds-sport-media/customization for customization options

Classes/SnapscreenUIFontConfiguration.ht.name: SnapscreenUIFontConfiguration
Classes/SnapscreenUIFontConfiguration.ht.abstract: Configuration for fonts in Snapscreen provided UI. See https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/snapodds-operator/customization or https://docs.snapodds.com/docs/mobile-sdk/ios/snapodds-sport-media/customization for customization options

Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.name: SnapscreenFingerprintResult
Classes/SnapscreenFingerprintResult.html.abstract: Represents a fingerprinting result of a captured image - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html.name: SnapscreenQuadrangle
Classes/SnapscreenQuadrangle.html.abstract: Represents a quadrangle on the screen that contains a search result - intented to be used only by Snapscreen internally

Classes/Snapscreen.html.name: Snapscreen
Classes/Snapscreen.html.abstract: Snapscreen offers the entry point for configuring the SDK

Classes/OddsResultsViewController.html.name: OddsResultsViewController
Classes/OddsResultsViewController.html.abstract: OddsResultsViewController offers the game odds presentation UI including all the loading and grouping logic to your application. Instantiate directly by passing the desired sport event and optional tv channel.

Classes/SnapViewController.html.name: SnapViewController
Classes/SnapViewController.html.abstract: SnapViewController offers the snapping UI including all the logic to your application. Instantiate via one of the provided class methods depending on the desired operation mode.
